title: guNijanAdinuta guruguhOdatE
sahitya:
guNijanAdinuta guruguhOdayE gurjari rAgapriyEvA shivE


caraNam   maNimaya bhUSaNi mAnava pOSaNi madhura bhASiNi mAnasa tOSiNi 
				(ciTTasvara)
sa  ga ri sa ri ga dha pa ma pa dha ri* sa* ga* sa* rI sa* ni sa* dha ni pa dha pa dha ga ma ri ga sa ri *ni
				(sAhitya)
gaNapati phaNipati shayana vidhinutE gaja ratha turaga padayutE lalitE
(cittasvara sAhitya)
karAkSa mAlA karENa kasmalApura vihArENa puruhUtAtyakhila 
dEva pUjita vighnEshvarENa vara guruguha sOdarENa surucira 
lambOdarENa karuNAnka gauratarENa kali mala haraNa tarENa
